issue.title: nsw2u.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://nsw2u.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnsw2u.com%2F) ### Comment > When the extension is enabled and it tries connecting to the page for the first time it gets on an unresponsive state not loading the page. Once the page is loaded you can enable the extension and use it properly for a while, but later when refreshing the page the problem starts again. Based on the way is acting I would say that the problem is not exactly in the website itself but in the cloudflare user verification: once the verification is passed, adguard works fine, but get stuck on it. Username: `@Drakull` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fbeavahmvzcogc8ckokk0c0444g400st9zsetiz3u8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pieopz0b8iokscc4gw44o4ggow84cwcpiimlilxizk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/3vsbzf5ie3cwsg4kko04ocwgkwc4ck0a1d4tpz3uio.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
In case anyone else has the same problem this rule fixes it but needs changing because tenplay.com.au has become 10play.com.au

I had this problem on a Firestick. Other devices including a CCWGTV  running the same app and version number continued to work fine.

issue.body:
